title: Demon
description: I am the devil. A heartless, cold-blooded fucking killer. Nothing can fucking stop me. I don't have a heart. My heart is frosted. Cold. Solid. My heart doesn't fucking beat. It rests inside my chest, seeking revenge for every fucking bastard that harmed me. They call me Demon. I don't love. I refuse to bleed. I never cry. I grew. I met loyal brothers. And together we run this fucking City. Now, we're coming for them. I'm no longer Tony the crybaby fucking kid, who begs for you to stop. I'm the mother fucking King you'll be begging in the end.  (Mature audience only. Also, Demon can be read as a standalone)  TRIGGER WARNING: This book is REALLY dark and was written to be disturbing. The story includes domestic violence, sexual abuse, child abuse, child sexual abuse, drug abuse. Please do not buy this book if these subjects offend you.
author: Mikey B.
